item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The Creator is the most creative Wordpress template we ever made. You can use a lot of useful and impressive features to create your website. You can create the corporate or personal websites and customise your presentation via simple changing of several settings in our comfortable admin system. [raw] [frame] Creator Multilingual You can translate the all contents of your website by WPML Plugin to another language. We prepared all sections and items in admin for using of this great fetaure. [/frame] [/raw] [raw] [one_half] Main Features [list style="style1"] Multilingual: all contents are translatable by WPML Administration: global or custom settings Slider: Anything Slider or Cluster Text on any page Service boxes: created by groups of custom items Home Widgets: 3-cols with Widgetized slider Products: great presentation of the item groups Themebox: changes can be saved into the theme Shortcodes: usable in content and widgets, too Pages: one columned or page with sidebar Footer: 4 columns of custom widgets [/list] [/one_half] [one_half_last] Special Sections We create several interesting sections where you can present your products or useful content. You can use the 3 columns of Home widget areas with widget slider. The Anything Slider, customizable Service boxes and great Product…

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The Compound is Wordpress template created in minimalistic design style. You can create the corporate or personal websites by many features that can customise your presentation via simple changing of several settings. [raw] [one_third] [frame] HOME SETTINGS Layout Settings and Slider Preferences [/frame][/one_third] [one_third] [frame] PAGE LAYOUT Page Properties and Color Variations [/frame][/one_third] [one_third_last] [frame] MAIN FEATURES Our Shortcodes and Other Features [/frame][/one_third_last] [/raw] [modal-link name="modal1"][/modal-link] Compound theme comes with various subpages – fixed or flexible height with smart or expanded sidebar. Have a look at examples here. [raw] [modal-content name="modal1" width="600px" height="500px"] Modal: Main Features & Colors Our powerful Admin panel will allows you to set your own colors to many important parts of the website. You won’t have to edit anything in CSS files. [image][/image] Main Compound Features [list style="style1"] Minimalistic Clean & Universal Design Style Impressive Anything Slider with Picture & Video Slides Smart Layout with Global & Individual Page Styles Universal Portfolio & Many Useful Shortcodes Customisable Colors & Backgrounds in all Sections [/list] The Compound is minimalist theme that will also allows you to create content rich website. Theme can be very compact or you can expand it to look as normal website. Whole website was designed with an iPad…

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Shortcodes will help you create a professional looking website in no time. All shortcodes can be inserted into your web content directly from Wordpress WYSIWYG editor using our custom built AIT Buttons. Shortcodes can be used anywhere in pages, posts and also in widgets. That means you can put professionally looking content into your sidebar, inside or outside footer as well. [image][/image] Common Useful Shortcodes To create or combine all of the shortcodes you may need this universal types of shortcodes. It’s recommanded to wrap complicated shortcodes to [raw] .. [/raw] shortcode to disable WP autoformatting. [raw] [frame bgcolor="#333333"] [code][raw] .. content .. [/raw] // Disables WP autoformatting[/code] [/frame] [frame bgcolor="#333333"] [code][rule] // Classic horizontal rule[/code] [/frame] [frame bgcolor="#333333"] [code][rule_top] // Horizontal rule with TOP button[/code] [/frame] [/raw]

item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Shortcodes will help you create a professional looking website in no time. All shortcodes can be inserted into your web content directly from Wordpress WYSIWYG editor using our custom built AIT Buttons. Shortcodes can be used anywhere in pages, posts and also in widgets. That means you can put professionally looking content into your sidebar, inside or outside footer as well. [image][/image] [rule]

Common Useful Shortcodes

To create or combine all of the shortcodes you may need this universal types of shortcodes. It's recommanded to wrap complicated shortcodes to [raw] .. [/raw] shortcode to disable WP autoformatting. [raw] [frame bgcolor="#DFF8FF" version="light"] [code][lang=en] .. content .. [/lang] ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Content will be displayed in English language version only. This shortcode can be useful for the widget's titles or other textareas, too.[/code] [/frame] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][raw] .. content .. [/raw] // Disables WP autoformatting[/code] [/frame] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][rule] // Classic horizontal rule[/code] [/frame] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][rule_top] // Horizontal rule with TOP button[/code] [/frame] [/raw]

Common Classes you may need

.clearfix clearing of floated elements - use on superordinate element
.fl for floating left
.fr for floating right
.uppercase sets text-transform to uppercase style
.bold sets font-weight to bold style
.thumb on IMG sets transparent border above the image
.aligncenter sets elements to the center
.alignleft sets floating to left with right margin
.alignright sets floating to right with left margin
.cleanmargin sets margins to 0px
.cleanmargin-bottom sets bottom margin to 0px
.cleanpadding sets paddingss to 0px
.clean-line sets line-height to the default value

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The GuestHouse is the creative Wordpress template prepared for primarily Hotels, Pensions, Ski Resorts, Travel Agency - whole Hospitality Industry. You can create the personal website with a lot of professional features, too. We prepared several sections with global and local settings. You can order this sections among them and fill the section contents by categorizable custom items. [raw] [one_third] [frame]

Page Layout

  • Homepage Layout
  • Default Page Layout
  • Fullwidth Layout
[/frame] [/one_third] [one_third] [frame]

Great Features

  • Orderable Sections
  • Universal Portfolio
  • Custom Sidebars
[/frame] [/one_third] [one_third_last] [frame]

Shortcodes

You can easly create the layout of your pages by many great shortcodes using our custom built AIT Buttons.

[/frame] [/one_third_last] [/raw] GuestHouse allows you to create your presentation via simple changing of several settings in our comfortable admin system. You can translate the all contents by WPML plugin to another language.

item.title: GuestHouse Features
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The Longpage is Wordpress template created in modern design style usable for desktop, tablet or cell devices. You can create the one-page website with several prepared section and create the layout by your way or you can use the section for your standrad website presentation. [raw] [one_half] [frame]

Main Features of Longpage

  • Modern clean & universal design style
  • Impressive sections usable for any page.
  • Smart layout with global & individual settings
  • Universal portfolio & many useful shortcodes
  • Customisable colors & backgrounds in all sections
  • Custom Built Admin panel
[/frame] [/one_half] [one_half_last] [frame]

Great Sections for One-page design

  • Anything Slider Section
  • Content Section (fullwidth, sidebar right/left)
  • IconSet Section (created for icon & photo sets)
  • Great Pictures Presentation Section
  • Grid-Gallery Section with great effects
  • Video Section for professional video presentation
[/frame] [/one_half_last] [/raw]

Minimalist Template can be used for any business:

Hotel & hospitality, restaurant, real estate, marketing company, blog, cms, portfolio website, software & computer sales, information technology, travel & tourism, solicitors, car business, music industry, food & drinks, human resources and personal relations organizations, school, university and college websites, science, magazine & community websites, blog and many more. With Best Regards AIT Team

Open Modal by Button link

This is the button created by shortcode to open custom modal window. Click on the button to show the content. [/three_fourth_last] [frame bgcolor="#f2f2f2" version="light"] [code][button title="OPEN" modalname="modal1" description="Modal Window" width="100%" version="light" position="left" bgcolor="#5FCAFF" color="#FFFFFF"][/code] [/frame] [/raw]  

Modal Window Content

You need to define the Modal Window Content somewhere on the end of the page to create something like this. You can define several modal windows and call them by the name parameter. item.content:encoded:
Slider display images from the Room section. Each Page can be set individualy, with Big, Small or No slider. Also which category slider it have to show. The slider can be translated to the other language by wpml plugin, too. You can create the category for the other language and set it for the slider on the translated page.
